item.title: State Department enacts widespread layoffs, cutting 1,353 staff
item.description: The involuntary staff reductions include 1,107 civil service and 246 foreign service employees, according to a notice sent to employees Friday morning...

item.title: Trump meets Texas flood victims' families, expressing "anguish of our entire nation"
item.description: President Trump and first lady Melania Trump visited Central Texas Friday to survey the devastation wrought by last week's deadly flooding.

item.title: Examining the role of climate change in deadly Texas floods
item.description: Climate change likely played a role in the deadly Texas floods that have killed over 120 people, according to Texas A&M climatologist Jay Banner. CBS ...

item.title: El Chapo's son pleads guilty to drug trafficking charges in Chicago hearing
item.description: A son of drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman pled guilty in a U.S. drug trafficking case at a hearing in Chicago Friday.

item.title: Trump holds roundtable on deadly Texas floods with first responders and officials
item.description: President Trump and local officials held a news conference Friday in Texas on the floods that have killed more than 120 people. CBS News White House r...
